info: The project  will contribute to develop a sustainable urban transport system (UTS)  in GCC, which forms part of north Greater Dhaka, through the delivery of a 20-kilometer (km) bus rapid transit (BRT) corridor. This pilot project provides a holistic solution for integrated urban mobility, bearing a demonstration effect as no modern mass transit system exists in Bangladesh yet.
name: GREATER DHAKA SUSTAINABLE URBAN TRANSP0RT PROJECT
